Pre-Game Insights: Portland aims to continue its three-game home winning streak.
The Trail Blazers are 8-7 on their home court and 7-6 when they turn the ball over less than their opponents, averaging 15.4 turnovers per game.
The 76ers are 7-8 on the road and 4-11 in games decided by 10 points or more.
The Trail Blazers are shooting 44.3% from the field this season, 3.4 percentage points lower than the 47.7% the 76ers allow to opponents.
The 76ers' 44.3% shooting percentage from the field this season is 3.7 percentage points lower than the Trail Blazers have allowed to their opponents (48.0%).
